file_content.text: The Empire will learn much from the relics you retrieved.
We must recover those artifacts. Otherwise, this excavation was all for nothing.
Can you sense it, my lord? Something out there? I wish it were in my head, but I know it's real.
You certainly look fearless... and strong. I could use your help out here.
Good to have company, and well armed, too. It's too quiet out here.
Please excuse me. It's these long nights, excavating relics near the Dark Temple. I'm Major Swaine Lothar, Imperial Reclamation Service.
My team uncovered several significant artifacts at a nearby dig. That's when things started going wrong.
Perhaps your team exhumed something.
Maybe you dug too deep.
They didn't report anything like that. Just the artifacts. Then the mysterious visitors.
There a finder's fee for these relics?
Priceless, eh?
Of course. But there's more than relics in those caves.
Going wrong? How?
I'm sorry. It's just that I can hardly make sense of it myself.
Stop trembling, worm.
I lead dig teams, that's all I'm trained for.
First it was strange noises from the temple, then figures lurking nearby. My team didn't like it, but I told them to push on.
Now they're days overdue, and I owe a report to Lord Duen. But I can't go out there... I need someone to find them, make sure the artifacts make it.
Those artifacts will be with the Empire soon.
I'll check it out.
I'll get your boys and your trinkets.
Rescue and recover. Got it.
Thank you. I was just about to write the whole dig off as a loss.
My backbone's the strongest.
Wish I could say the same for myself.
My team's still in those caves. Whatever's happened, please bring those relics to Lord Duen. He's overseeing a small camp by the Dark Temple.
So long. [Refuse quest]
Fine--leave. I'm sure there's nothing out here that could hurt me. Right?
Something's out there. I can feel it.
